name: ProfitWell Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 ProfitWell Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume ProfitWell API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume ProfitWell API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: metric

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Retrieve financial metric broken down by day for either the current month or the last

type.name: type
available_options: Daily (值: daily) - Retrieve financial metric broken down by day for either the current month or the last
Monthly (值: monthly) - Retrieve all monthly financial metric for your company

month.name: month
month.description: Can only be the current or previous month. Format should be YYYY-MM.
month.natural_language_description: 参数名: Month | 作用: Can only be the current or previous month. Format should be YYYY-MM. | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: plan_id (值: None) - Only return the metric for this Plan ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
dailyMetrics (值: None) - Comma-separated list of metric trends to return (the default is to return all metric)
monthlyMetrics (值: None) - Comma-separated list of metric trends to return (the default is to return all metric)
